alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 08 at 1:14AM CDT until July 08 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE affecting Meade County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cimarron River Near Forgan 8NNE. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in southern Meade County on downstream into Oklahoma. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:00 AM CDT Saturday was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this morning and continue falling to 4.2 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 5.1 feet on 06/25/1972. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 115 PM CDT.
